***WORKS PERFECTLY***

Zitorix, Did you install the required MISSING redistributables?

This game requires the 3rd one on this list http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=26347
Direct link: http://download.microsoft.com/download/8/B/4/8B42259F-5D70-43F4-AC2E-4B208FD8D66A/vcredist_x86.EXE

@zitorix sounds like a missing runtime of some sort. Side by Side is a generic Window Vista/7/8 error that means it cannot find something required for the software to run properly. Most commonly it is usually a specific build of Visual Basic/CRT/ATL.. but could also be DX Builds, .NET etc..
DIP! (I downloaded it, installed it, played it.) No problems.
